requirement_tested: Frontend application with pages for browsing, sharing, and searching promotions
user_persona: A budget-conscious shopper looking for deals.
user_goal: Find and share a discount on electronics using the search and share features.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website to look for tech deals. She immediately sees a clean ivory background with forest green UI blocks.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page renders with correct colors and layout as per design guidelines.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Electronics
narrative_steps.description: She types 'laptop' into the search bar and hits Enter.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'laptop' into the search input and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Promotions related to laptops are displayed in a responsive grid below.

narrative_steps.title: Sharing a Deal
narrative_steps.description: Sarah finds a good deal and clicks the share button on the promotion card.
narrative_steps.action: Click the share icon on a promotion card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal appears with social media icons and a direct link to the promotion.

requirement_tested: Backend API server to manage promotions, users, and website settings
user_goal: Verify that backend APIs are running and responding correctly.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Promotion API Endpoint
narrative_steps.description: Admin sends a GET request to fetch all promotions from the backend.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to /api/promotions.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns a list of promotions in JSON format with HTTP status 200.

requirement_tested: PostgreSQL database connection using environment variables DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME
user_persona: A DevOps engineer deploying the app.
user_goal: Confirm the backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Engineer starts the backend service and monitors logs for successful DB connection.
narrative_steps.action: Start backend server process.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Log indicates successful connection to PostgreSQL using provided environment variables.

requirement_tested: User authentication system for accessing the management backend
user_persona: Marketing manager needing access to the admin dashboard.
user_goal: Log into the admin panel securely.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Admin Login
narrative_steps.description: Alex goes to the admin login page to access promotional tools.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to /admin/login.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displays a centered login form with email and password fields.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Credentials
narrative_steps.description: He enters his valid email and password then clicks Login.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in email and password, click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirects to /admin/dashboard and stores JWT token in localStorage.

requirement_tested: Promotion creation, editing, and deletion functionality in the management backend
user_goal: Update an outdated promotion in the system.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Promotion Management Panel
narrative_steps.description: Admin logs in and navigates to the promotions management section.
narrative_steps.action: Log in and navigate to admin promotions list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displays a table of existing promotions with edit and delete actions.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Existing Promotion
narrative_steps.description: Admin selects a promotion to update its end date.
narrative_steps.action: Click the edit icon next to a promotion entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the promotion edit form pre-filled with current data.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Updated Promotion
narrative_steps.description: After updating the end date, admin saves the changes.
narrative_steps.action: Modify end date and click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Promotion is updated in the database and reflected in the list.

requirement_tested: User management interface in the backend for administrators
user_goal: Change a user's role from standard to admin.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing User Accounts
narrative_steps.description: Owner accesses the user management tab in the admin panel.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to user management section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Shows a table of users including their roles and actions.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Role
narrative_steps.description: Owner finds a user and changes their role to admin.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'admin' from the role dropdown for a selected user.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Userâ€™s role updates instantly in the database and UI reflects change.

requirement_tested: Website settings configuration panel in the management backend
user_goal: Update the website title shown in the browser tab.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Settings Panel
narrative_steps.description: Webmaster navigates to the settings configuration area.
narrative_steps.action: Go to the website settings panel in the admin dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Panel displays editable fields for configurable site settings.

narrative_steps.title: Changing Site Title
narrative_steps.description: Webmaster updates the site title field and saves changes.
narrative_steps.action: Edit site title input and click Save Changes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New title is saved and used throughout the frontend where applicable.

requirement_tested: Search functionality allowing users to filter promotions by keywords or categories
user_persona: Casual visitor interested in fashion discounts.
user_goal: Filter promotions specifically under the 'Fashion' category.

narrative_steps.title: Using Category Filter
narrative_steps.description: Visitor chooses 'Fashion' from the category dropdown menu.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Fashion' from the category filter dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only promotions tagged under Fashion appear in the results grid.

requirement_tested: Promotion sharing capability through social media or direct links
user_persona: Active social media user promoting a great deal.
user_goal: Share a promotion directly to Facebook.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Share Modal
narrative_steps.description: User clicks the share button on a promotion they want to post about.
narrative_steps.action: Click share icon on a promotion card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Modal window opens with social sharing options and direct link.

narrative_steps.title: Sharing to Social Media
narrative_steps.description: They choose to share the promotion on Facebook.
narrative_steps.action: Click the Facebook icon in the share modal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Facebook Share Dialog opens with the promotion URL pre-filled.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design with ivory colored outer layout and forest green UI blocks
user_goal: Browse promotions comfortably on a small screen.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Site on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: User visits the site using a smartphone browser.
narrative_steps.action: Open site on mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site loads with responsive layout adapting to smaller viewport size.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Color Scheme
narrative_steps.description: User scrolls down to check visual consistency.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll through different sections of the page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Outer layout remains ivory (#FFFFF0), inner UI blocks stay forest green (#228B22).

requirement_tested: RESTful API endpoints for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting promotions
user_persona: Third-party developer integrating with the platform.
user_goal: Use the API to add a new promotion programmatically.

narrative_steps.title: Sending POST Request
narrative_steps.description: Developer makes a POST request to create a new promotion.
narrative_steps.action: Make POST request to /api/promotions with valid promotion data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Receives HTTP 201 Created and the newly created promotion object in response.

requirement_tested: Data validation and error handling for all user inputs and API requests
user_persona: Tester probing edge cases in forms.
user_goal: Trigger validation errors intentionally to confirm feedback mechanism works.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Empty Form
narrative_steps.description: Tester tries submitting the promotion form without filling any fields.
narrative_steps.action: Leave all fields empty and click Submit Promotion.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form does not submit; displays clear validation messages for each missing field.

requirement_tested: Concurrent development setup with npm run dev starting both frontend and backend
user_persona: Frontend developer working alongside backend logic.
user_goal: Run both frontend and backend locally for integrated development.

narrative_steps.title: Running Concurrent Development Script
narrative_steps.description: Developer executes the concurrent startup command.
narrative_steps.action: Execute 'npm run dev' in project root terminal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend servers start simultaneously in the same terminal session.

requirement_tested: Installation script via package.json supporting npm run install:all for dependencies

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Contributor clones repo and runs the full install command.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run install:all' from the project root.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Installs dependencies for both frontend and backend without manual intervention.

requirement_tested: Static asset serving for frontend files when not using dynamic content
user_persona: End-user loading static assets like images.
user_goal: See placeholder images load correctly on promotion cards.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Promotion Cards
narrative_steps.description: User views the promotions page and notices placeholder images if real images aren't available.
narrative_steps.action: Visit promotions browse page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each promotion card displays the promo-placeholder.png image correctly.
